name: HeavenSpot
description:
This is a revamp of the game Focuslash, originally created by our very own Carsen Decker. Besides giving the game a new look, we overhauled the controls and the mechanics to make for more intuitive and fresher gameplay. This was for our Major Studio (Spring 2020) class.


Credits
  • CARSEN DECKER - Creative Director, Combat Designer, Level Designer, Lead Programmer
  • GENRIC JUNE ELAZEGUI - Level Designer, Animation Programmer, Tilemap Guru
  • BRENDY MARQUARDT - Environment artist, Character Artist
  • LIANNA PANG - Art Designer, 2D Artist, Animation Artist
  • ISIAH ROSA - Level Designer, UI Artist, Playtesting Lead
